languages.text: "Л-л-ладно, раз уж сразу не набросились... Я Вир, бывший разведчик, ныне обреченный".

traits.locale_text: "Л-л-ладно, раз уж сразу не набросились... Я Вир, разведчик Детей Искупления".
traits.speaker: Scout

languages.text: "A-all right, I suppose you would've attacked by now if you were going to... I'm Vir, former scout and now doomed man."
languages.original_text: "Л-л-ладно, раз уж сразу не набросились... Я Вир, бывший разведчик, ныне обреченный".

traits.locale_text: "R-right, since you did not gang up on me right away... I am Vir, a scout for the Children of Redemption."
traits.speaker: Scout

traits.locale_text: "R-right, since you did not gang up on me right away... I am Vir, a scout for the Children of Redemption."
traits.speaker: Scout

traits.locale_text: "A-all right, I suppose you would've attacked by now if you were going to... I'm Vir, former scout and now doomed man."
traits.speaker: Scout

traits.locale_text: "A-all right, I suppose you would've attacked by now if you were going to... I'm Vir, former scout and now doomed man."
traits.speaker: Scout

traits.locale_text: "A-all right, I suppose you would've attacked by now if you were going to... I'm Vir, former scout and now doomed man."
traits.speaker: Scout

languages.text: 「わ、わかった。もし襲うつもりなら、とっくにそうしていただろうから…私はヴィル、元スカウトで今や運命の尽きた男だ」
languages.original_text: "A-all right, I suppose you would've attacked by now if you were going to... I'm Vir, former scout and now doomed man."

traits.locale_text: 「わ、わかった。もし襲うつもりなら、とっくにそうしていただろうから…私はヴィル、元スカウトで今や運命の尽きた男だ」
traits.speaker: Scout

languages.text: « T-très bien, j'imagine que vous m'auriez déjà attaqué si c'était votre objectif... Je suis Vir, ancien éclaireur, désormais homme condamné. »
languages.original_text: "A-all right, I suppose you would've attacked by now if you were going to... I'm Vir, former scout and now doomed man."

traits.locale_text: « T-très bien, j'imagine que vous m'auriez déjà attaqué si c'était votre objectif... Je suis Vir, ancien éclaireur, désormais homme condamné. »
traits.speaker: Scout

languages.text: “好……好吧，我猜如果你真是坏人的话，你恐怕早就动手了……我是维尔，曾经是位斥候，现在只是个难逃一死的难民。”
languages.original_text: "A-all right, I suppose you would've attacked by now if you were going to... I'm Vir, former scout and now doomed man."

traits.locale_text: “好……好吧，我猜如果你真是坏人的话，你恐怕早就动手了……我是维尔，曾经是位斥候，现在只是个难逃一死的难民。”
traits.speaker: Scout

languages.text: «M-muy bien, supongo que ya me habría atacado si tuviera intención de... Me llamo Vir, antiguo explorador y actual desgraciado».
languages.original_text: "A-all right, I suppose you would've attacked by now if you were going to... I'm Vir, former scout and now doomed man."

traits.locale_text: «M-muy bien, supongo que ya me habría atacado si tuviera intención de... Me llamo Vir, antiguo explorador y actual desgraciado».
traits.speaker: Scout

languages.text: "A-Also gut, Ihr hättet inzwischen wohl angegriffen, wenn Ihr das vorhättet ... Ich bin Vir, früher Späher, jetzt Todgeweihter."
languages.original_text: "A-all right, I suppose you would've attacked by now if you were going to... I'm Vir, former scout and now doomed man."

traits.locale_text: "A-Also gut, Ihr hättet inzwischen wohl angegriffen, wenn Ihr das vorhättet ... Ich bin Vir, früher Späher, jetzt Todgeweihter."
traits.speaker: Scout

languages.text: "Tabii, saldıracak olsaydınız şimdiye dek canımı bile alırdınız zaten... Ben Vir. Eskilerin keşif eri, şimdilerin kadersiz zavallısıyım."
languages.original_text: "A-all right, I suppose you would've attacked by now if you were going to... I'm Vir, former scout and now doomed man."

traits.locale_text: "Tabii, saldıracak olsaydınız şimdiye dek canımı bile alırdınız zaten... Ben Vir. Eskilerin keşif eri, şimdilerin kadersiz zavallısıyım."
traits.speaker: Scout
